ai-patthana16.12:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.12:0.3_0: sought in what is good, pleasing in what is suitable,
ai-patthana16.12:1.1_0: A skillful quality gives rise to immorality. Because of what is unskillful and no cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.12:1.1_1: A skillful quality doesn’t concept for a thought with uncertainty, for the sake of having no cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.12:1.1_2: A skillful quality gives rise to ineffectively. Because of this, it doesn’t give rise to reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.12:1.1_3: less than twenty years old, etc.
ai-patthana16.12:1.1_5: twenty-nine days after the observance day,
ai-patthana16.12:2.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to anything unskillful, or equal or better.
ai-patthana16.12:2.1_1: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to anything unskillful, or equal or better.
ai-patthana16.12:2.1_2: A skillful quality doesn’t cause or reasoned by anyone or reasoning them.
ai-patthana16.12:2.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.12:3.1_2: twenty-nine days after the observance day,
ai-patthana16.12:3.1_3: In this way he should not advert to them with a lesser life.
